nodes.text: P-2XN was a droid that served the Galactic Republic during the Cold War with the reconstituted Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. P-2XN was stationed as a courier aboard the Republic's Carrick Station, delivering messages and mission briefings to the Republic personnel aboard. In 3640 BBY he asked Republic citizens to listen to a message regarding the threat of the Directive 7.

P-2XN was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. P-2XN serves as a Flashpoint Courier aboard Carrick Station.
